document_data.name: Eregar Abanther
document_data.mainbody: '''Eregar Abanther''' was a servant of [[Tempus]] in [[Cormyr]]. He possessed a suit of battered and stained battle armor. He was involved in preparing [[Bhereu Ammaeth|Duke Bhereu Ammaeth's]] body for resting.
